title: Xpollens
subtitle: Lead Product Manager
overview: Led product strategy and development for a next-generation Banking-as-a-Service platform, enabling fintech companies to launch compliant financial products rapidly.
challenge: Financial institutions needed a flexible, compliant platform to launch embedded banking products quickly while maintaining regulatory standards and security.
solution: Designed and implemented a modular BaaS platform with comprehensive API documentation, white-label capabilities, and automated compliance workflows.
responsibilities: Defined product vision and roadmap for BaaS platform
Led cross-functional team of 12 engineers and designers
Established API-first architecture and developer experience standards
Implemented agile methodologies and sprint planning processes
Collaborated with compliance team to ensure regulatory adherence

outcomes.description: Reduction in time-to-market for new financial products
Fintech partners onboarded in first year

images.caption: Real-time analytics dashboard for financial operations

testimonial.quote: Raphaël's strategic vision and execution transformed our platform capabilities, enabling us to scale rapidly while maintaining quality.
testimonial.author: CTO, Xpollens

title: Citio
subtitle: Lead Product Manager/Engineer
overview: Bridged product management and engineering to deliver a comprehensive SaaS solution, combining strategic product thinking with hands-on technical implementation.
challenge: The company needed to rapidly iterate on product features while maintaining code quality and technical debt under control.
solution: Established dual role combining product strategy with frontend engineering, enabling faster decision-making and implementation cycles.
responsibilities: Defined product strategy and technical architecture
Implemented frontend features using React and TypeScript
Conducted user research and usability testing
Managed product backlog and sprint planning
Collaborated with stakeholders on feature prioritization

outcomes.description: Faster feature delivery through integrated approach

images.caption: Redesigned user interface with improved UX

testimonial.quote: Having someone who understands both product strategy and technical implementation was invaluable for our growth phase.
testimonial.author: CEO, Citio

title: 1P6
subtitle: Head of Product/Engineering
overview: Led product and engineering teams to build scalable enterprise solutions, establishing processes and culture for sustainable growth.
challenge: Scale product development while maintaining quality, establish engineering best practices, and build a high-performing team culture.
solution: Implemented comprehensive product development framework, established engineering standards, and built collaborative team culture focused on outcomes.
responsibilities: Led product strategy and engineering operations
Established engineering best practices and code standards
Managed stakeholder relationships and product roadmap

testimonial.quote: Raphaël's leadership transformed our product development process and team culture, setting us up for long-term success.
testimonial.author: Founder, 1P6
